thread.title: Lovely hotel in a good location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in a good location - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: spanner74
title: Lovely hotel in a good location
text:
We travel as 4 adults (mum and sisters) and often struggle to get a quad room. When we found this one at a very reasonable price we were thrilled. Additionally, it is only a few mins walk from tube stations and a stroll away from Portobello Market, Notting Hill, Hyde Park and Kensington Palace.
The room was spacious and clean with very comfortable beds. The bathroom had a good shower but was a tad on the small side for getting dry, however this is because the room itself had plenty of space.
There were tea and coffee facilities, a fridge, a safe and basic toiletries included. Unfortunately our milk cartons were off but reception rectified this immediately.
The reception staff were efficient and helpful but could do to be a little warmer.
Overall a good hotel in a cracking location. We will be back.
